get.description:
Checks the health of a project.

It returns 200 if the project is healthy.

post.description:
Sends echo back to user.

:param incoming_message: incoming message.
:returns: message same as the incoming.

get.description:
Retrieve all dummy objects from the database.

:param limit: limit of dummy objects, defaults to 10.
:param offset: offset of dummy objects, defaults to 0.
:param dummy_dao: DAO for dummy models.
:return: list of dummy objects from database.

schema.title: Response Get Dummy Models Api Dummy  Get

put.description:
Creates dummy model in the database.

:param new_dummy_object: new dummy model item.
:param dummy_dao: DAO for dummy models.

post.description:
Posts a message in a rabbitMQ's exchange.

:param message: message to publish to rabbitmq.
:param pool: rabbitmq channel pool
